Note-Art JS

Music Theory in code

Get Started →

Simple & Intuitive

Create Notes, Chord, Scales and more easily.

Play different instruments

Note-Art loads instrument audio-files from a server and can play any note, currently supports only piano.

Easily schedule notes to play anything

Uses ToneJS to take advantage of the Web-Audio-API to schedule perfectly without delays.
